Test Name: T-Cell Receptor Delta Immunostain (Technical Component Only)
Purpose: To detect T-cell receptor delta expression in tissue sections by immunohistochemistry as part of the analytical (technical) phase, ensuring accurate and reliable staining results.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged microscope slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, immunostainer or manual staining racks, humidity chamber, light microscope
